name.title: Name
name.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

defaultLabels.title: defaultLabels
defaultLabels.description: Determines whether to use the default set of labels.

defaultLists.title: defaultLists
defaultLists.description: Determines whether to add the default set of lists to a board (To Do, Doing, Done). It is ignored if idBoardSource is provided.

desc.title: desc
desc.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long.

idOrganization.title: idOrganization
idOrganization.description: The id or name of the team the board should belong to.

idBoardSource.title: idBoardSource
idBoardSource.description: The id of a board to copy into the new board.

keepFromSource.title: keepFromSource
keepFromSource.description: To keep cards from the original board pass in the value cards

powerUps.title: powerUps
powerUps.description: The Power-Ups that should be enabled on the new board. One of: all, calendar, cardAging, recap, voting.

prefs_permissionLevel.title: prefs_permissionLevel
prefs_permissionLevel.description: The permissions level of the board. One of: org, private, public.

prefs_voting.title: prefs_voting
prefs_voting.description: Who can vote on this board. One of disabled, members, observers, org, public.

prefs_comments.title: prefs_comments
prefs_comments.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: disabled, members, observers, org, public.

prefs_invitations.title: prefs_invitations
prefs_invitations.description: Determines what types of members can invite users to join. One of: admins, members.

prefs_selfJoin.title: prefs_selfJoin
prefs_selfJoin.description: Determines whether users can join the boards themselves or whether they have to be invited.

prefs_cardCovers.title: prefs_cardCovers
prefs_cardCovers.description: Determines whether card covers are enabled.

prefs_background.title: prefs_background
prefs_background.description: The id of a custom background or one of: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey.

prefs_cardAging.title: prefs_cardAging
prefs_cardAging.description: Determines the type of card aging that should take place on the board if card aging is enabled. One of: pirate, regular.
